channel.title: Bash script error
channel.description:
I'm having a problem with my startup script on my unix server.
#!/bin/bash cd bin java -Xms170M -Xmx200M -cp .;mysql.jar org.chaosscape.Server
My output error is:
user@ [~/SSH/ChaosScapeMySQL]# ./rs.sh Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap Could not create the Java virtual machine. ./mysql.jar: line 1: PK: command not found ./mysql.jar: line 2: a6: command not found ./mysql.jar: line 3: käHJËÐG» ./mysql.jar: line 3: ¥DÝü×¶sJR: command not found ./mysql.jar: line 14: ¸¤ TbJIvÑmÃ¦÷ç¶+%¤ )kEJªn´apò£íwÛE÷Z«Xôam]Âþ,BIaº `x}õµg¹E¬ÞwåFÌãü7­¼¨Ç5bÜøOè×fñ7PK a6com/PK a6 com/mysql/PK RMOÛ@}qbÌGJ a6cØ-com/mysql/jdbc/AssertionFailedException.class ! q¤¢¢¨CÈªH\*mì%,r ìÔýY½$UÚTÕY»hÂgôfgÞì¯ßØDMÃç^èHc>x©ÀWXÎaEeV5Æs/rìònW¸ ³åúÿÌM»móte¸Ká¹$\©[^Çì|Ü>9æ Ý²Ì½ ¾J>àÒö¢/ò-q äü} µGò(baú¦÷Ðnû]tv&|uºÆ0w¯Ø² ªÖ±¡áµAë1ª¨)Î-Ê¸Q<ÜPvÄ$!L¢/CõÒ"É*ªD"_ª^!}ÚG¦ðä=hë=äÈòULêìAïcäë@G«Þb{±ÖtÂB~&n¸«*­ Ù¸æÙPK`§Õ>R?ã ²Ùø §d U]pþÖ´«Í&NÛAÍÝbYÂ±ÓÚq NR*ã:Ô a ICÊÏJÚ8/mysql/jdbc/Blob.class ²Ö]­8¡´ü´MËo!üwxðP2ÓÚ.a;ÌÐNÞàxâá;WëõZ<èêî¹ç|çïsï;ÿýÍûñPLâAL.eü_0Ã¬&*¸dàó&ª3Qk`^> Ù ÷Ã¥.¾Ë&R(ÊrE«r² Ë5×åó:¾ ãY_4ðh CFÃ® cg/DúËÂpHL¨PëxÙÂ+ø9+yTÇ×-|ßÔñ- ßÆ«,.ië¯ÌÍW~Ë6ÕYñptÄÂðc »[|2âüjÀlsIp]¼äXÍk:_ÃC-ÑTbÇn' ?Á! user@ [~/SSH/ChaosScapeMySQL]# PuTTYPuTTYPuTTYPuTTY
I don't have this problem on windows, I can load it up fine. The MySQL jar is a required connector file that connects to MySQL so don't ask me to remove it. :P

item.title: Bash script error
item.dc:creator: @EwfsPrince EwfsPrince
